Subject: Last Introduction to Berserk

Content-Type: text/plain; charset=ISO-8859-1

From: wilddance_mare@...

Techy:




Berserk was in big trouble. She watched as she heard the last 
decision from the council. Berserk was a gonner. In the distance, she 
could hear the female bounty hunter laugh. It was peircing to her. 
She hated that Shadow Zone slag. 

The conclusion was that he be sent of in a stasis pod to rid of him. 
Away from harm of the Cybertronians. All that hard work, all the 
credits they put into him to make him normal was wasted away. All 
because a bounty hunter wanted him dead. Well, she got her greedy 
wish. 

She turned to Sky Knight, who stared up at the row of council 
members, glowering. She knew he felt the same way. He snapped, 
yelling at them that Berserk was a brilliant creation, not to be 
thrown away, but she drowned it out. She took a step back. She turned 
her head. She knew what ever they did, they won't be able to save 
Berserk. His fate was in the hands of the council's decision.
